title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: N.S.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black and yellow ink; brush and black ink,  yellow watercolor; graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: In graphite in lower right corner: "N.S."; at upper right corner: "522".
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Elipse-shaped monogram comprised of a yellow "S" intersected by a black "N".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: N.S.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black and yellow ink; brush and black ink,  yellow watercolor; graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-101.
